segments.text: I'd like to invite you to dinner tonight , do you think have time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your inition . I'm free tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which kind of food do you like , chinese food , western food or sea food ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ok . I'll pick up your hotel at 6 thirty pm .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's fine . I'll be waiting for you .
segments.speaker: S2
